name: overfeeding
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the practice of giving a person or animal too much food: Many parents mistake overfeeding for love. Even slight overfeeding can lead to unpleasant digestive outcomes.
More examplesFewer examplesCheck that overfeeding is not a contributory factor. This is the body's mechanism to prevent obesity due to overfeeding.The increase in the numbers of paunchy pets is being blamed on overfeeding, lack of exercise and poor diet.
